body:
`xsdk` is  recently changed to a `BundlePackage` at c9e214f6d3

```
bash-5.0$ spack fetch --dependencies xsdk
==> Error: Can only fetch a package with a URL.
```
I've used this functionality before to download all the package sources on front-end - so that the builds can be done on a back-end node [which have limited network connectivity]. But now its broke.

Perhaps the code should just warn about BundlePackage - and continue - and not error out?
title: fetch error with BundlePackage
